00011 #include "member_impl.h"
00012 #include "types/function_type.h"

00014 namespace reflection

00018 
00019         class method_member::method_impl : public member::member_impl
00020         {
00021         public:
00022                 method_impl(const char* name, void* deleg, function_type* type)
00023                         : member_impl(MEMBER_METHOD, name)
00024                         , m_type(type)
00025                 {
00026                         memcpy(m_delegBuf, deleg, sizeof(m_delegBuf));
00027                 }
00028 
00029                 method_impl(const method_impl& other)
00030                         : member_impl(MEMBER_METHOD, other.get_name())
00031                         , m_type(other.m_type)
00032                 {
00033                         memcpy(m_delegBuf, other.m_delegBuf, sizeof(m_delegBuf));
00034                 }
00035 
00036                 function_type* get_function_type() const
00037                 {
00038                         return m_type;
00039                 }
00040 
00041                 void invoke(void** args, void* result) const
00042                 {
00043                         m_type->invoke((void*)m_delegBuf, args, result);
00044                 }
00045 
00046         private:
00047                 char m_delegBuf[member::_deleg_buf_size];
00048                 function_type* m_type;
00049         };
00050 
00052         // method_member
00054 
00055         method_member::method_member(const char* name, void* deleg, function_type* type)
00056                 : member(new method_impl(name, deleg, type))
00057         {
00058                 m_impl = static_cast<method_impl*>(member::m_impl);
00059         }
00060 
00062 
00063         method_member::method_member(method_impl* impl)
00064                 : member(impl)
00065         {
00066                 m_impl = impl;
00067         }
00068 
00070 
00071         function_type* method_member::get_function_type() const
00072         {
00073                 return m_impl->get_function_type();
00074         }
00075 
00077 
00078         void method_member::invoke(void** args, void* result) const
00079         {
00080                 m_impl->invoke(args, result);
00081         }
00082 
00084 
00085         method_member* method_member::clone() const
00086         {
00087                 return new method_member(new method_impl(*m_impl));
00088         }

00091

00094                 delete this;
00095         }
